snippet: Alonzo Mourning and Mitch Richmond and the coaches Nolan Richardson and Gary Williams were voted to the Naismith Memorial Basketball Hall of Fame.
abstract: Alonzo Mourning and Mitch Richmond and coaches Nolan Richardson and Gary Williams are voted to the Naismith Memorial Basketball Hall of Fame.
lead_paragraph: Alonzo Mourning and Mitch Richmond and the coaches Nolan Richardson and Gary Williams were voted to the Naismith Memorial Basketball Hall of Fame.

headline.main: Alonzo Mourning Tops Hall of Fame Inductees
